00008 def usage():

00010         storing the outputs of each run in a a single file,\n\
00011         whose prefix is given by arg 2. The script will append\n\

00017         usage()

00019 for i in range(int(sys.argv[3])):
00020         command = sys.argv[1] + " > " + sys.argv[2] + str(i) + ".txt"
00021         print "Executing: \"" + command + "\""
00022         os.system(command)
